headTitle: La Paloma Blanca Entertainment | Events in Calpe

hero.title: Planning an event? Make it unforgettable.
hero.subtitle: Weddings, parties, cultural or corporate events — you imagine it, we make it happen.

babyshower.title: Baby Showers
babyshower.text: We create warm, intimate, and personalized atmospheres to welcome a new family member. Themed decor, catering, games, photo settings, and custom details — everything tailored to your style.

weddings.title: Weddings
weddings.text: We design bespoke weddings, from intimate ceremonies to large celebrations. We handle every detail: venue, floral decoration, lighting, music, vendor coordination, and event timeline. You enjoy the day — we make it flawless.

funerals.title: Funeral Tributes
funerals.text: We offer respectful and heartfelt alternatives to say goodbye to a loved one with harmony and beauty. Live music, floral design, catering, symbolic spaces, and personalized ceremonies are all part of our service.

about.title: About Us
about.paragraph1: La Paloma Blanca was born from a passion for celebration. For over a decade, we've worked with individuals, businesses, and institutions to create events that leave a lasting impact.
about.paragraph2: Clients choose us for our experience and emotional sensitivity. We don't just manage logistics — we interpret your vision and transform it into a meaningful and memorable experience.
reasons: More than 15 years of experience in organizing events.
No improvisation — we work with precision and intuition.
The value of an event is measured by its emotional impact, not its price.

steps.title: Active listening
steps.text: We ask questions, listen carefully, and understand what you're looking for.

steps.title: Personalized proposal
steps.text: We create a concept that fits exactly what you want to achieve.

steps.title: Full coordination
steps.text: We manage suppliers, permits, setup, and scheduling.

steps.title: Flawless execution
steps.text: We oversee everything on the day of the event so you can just enjoy.

steps.title: Post-event feedback
steps.text: We want to know how you felt, what you loved, and how we can improve.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Do you have an idea? A date? A location? Tell us everything.
contact.cta: Your event starts with a conversation.
